pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Retrie is a tool for codemodding Haskell. Key goals include:
* Speed: Efficiently rewrite in large (>1 million line) codebases. * Safety: Avoids large classes of codemod-related errors. * Ease-of-use: Haskell syntax instead of regular expressions. No hand-rolled AST traversals.
This package provides a command-line tool (@retrie@) and a library ("Retrie") for making equational edits to Haskell code.
Please see the [README](#readme) for examples and usage.
